title: New: Walsh – Don’t Want 2 Fall In Luv EP
content:
I’ve had a somewhat mixed relationship with the Knoxville based beat maker Walsh. His first EP, Smoke Weed About It, was unearthed gem; combining elements of ambient beat music, instrumental hip-hop and electronica to create something that throbbed with an uncertain yet gravitating energy. It also featured a great featuring slot from Squadda Bambino, an MC who should have a great future.

The EP that followed, Karaoke, for me personally, completely lacked personality. Thankfully, the latest offering from Walsh really hits the spot. He plays with genre as always, but this time with a purpose, stamping his sound on the styles he seeks to explore.

The new EP was put up online for streaming yesterday. Check it out below.

WALSH – Don’t Want 2 Fall In Luv EP by DRACULA HORSE
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
